_header: Father Son and Holy Ghost / Almighty God sitting in throne
_description: An Invocation (prefixed to the Pricke of Conscience) — one 8-line stanza

BLEge3245.First Lines: ffadir Sone and Holy GostAlmyhety god sittend in trone…
BLEge3245.Last Lines: …Here þat þow graunt me wel to doneAnd on me haue mercy and pite
BLEge3245.Note: All written in rubric, under frame now containing no image.
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 371.
